attributes.action: Stop a ban an all vehicles over 10 years old - be realistic!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some fool started a petition to ban cars over ten years of age. Well, sign here and stop that! I enjoy driving my 1973 Mini and I have no intension of getting rid of it! Why should I? I get better MPG in the Mini than most of my friends/colleges do in their cars - and they all have cars less than 3yrs old!
 Keep the classics on the road! They remind us all of our heritage!
